questions.question: Which of the following is a weak password?
What is a common method to improve the security of online accounts?
choices: A) Keeping passwords written down on sticky notes
C) Sharing passwords with friends and family
D)  Using the same password for multiple accounts

questions.question: Which one of the following is a type of antivirus program?
Which of the following describes the process for verifying the integrity of a message?
To protect the computer system against hackers and viruses, what is an essential tool to always keep on in the computer system?
What is the purpose of a VPN?
choices: A) Blocks access to certain websites
C) Encrypts internet traffic to protect data and privacy
questions.answer: C)  Encrypts internet traffic to protect data and privacy

questions.question: What is the initial step to take when responding to a cybersecurity incident?
choices: B)  Immediately paying any demanded ransom
C) Ignoring the incident and hoping it goes away
D) Reporting the incident to the proper authorities
questions.answer: D) Reporting the incident to the proper authorities

questions.question: Which of the following can be considered as the elements of cyber security?
Why do hackers usually use computer viruses?
choices: A) To log, monitor each and every user's stroke
B) To gain access the sensitive information like user's Id and Passwords
C) To log, monitor each and every user's stroke

questions.question: In cybersecurity, what is encryption?
choices: A) The process of monitoring and analyzing network traffic for potential security threats
B) The process of physically securing a computer system to prevent tampering
C) The process of encoding information in such a way that only authorized parties can access it
D) The process of updating software to fix security vulnerabilities
questions.answer: C) The process of encoding information in such a way that only authorized parties can access it

questions.question: Cyber Security provide security against what?
choices: B) Defends a device from threat.

questions.question: Which of the below is a kind of cyber security?
Which of the below does not constitute a cybercrime?
choices: D) AES which stands for Advanced Encryption Standard (safeguards data by encoding it)
questions.answer: D) AES which stands for Advanced Encryption Standard (safeguards data by encoding it)

questions.question: Which of the below benefits of cyber security is not true?
choices: B) Safeguards a device against threats

questions.question: Which of the below is a popular victim of cyber attackers looking to gain the IP address of a target or victim user?
You accidentally download a file from a suspicious website and notice your computer behaving strangely. What should you do?
choices: A) Continue using the computer as norma
C) Run a virus scan and remove any malware detected
D) Revisit the website to get in touch.
questions.answer: C) Run a virus scan and remove any malware detected.

questions.question: You receive an email from an unknown sender that contains a link to click on. What should you do?
choices: A) Click on the link to see what it is
B) Delete the email without clicking on the link
C) Forward the email to your IT department for advice
D) Reply to the email and ask the sender for more information
questions.answer: B) Delete the email without clicking on the link

questions.question: You notice that your computer is running slowly and some of your files are missing. What should you do?
choices: A)  Ignore the issue and continue using your computer
B)  Reset your computer to factory settings
C) Run a virus scan on your computer
D) Call a computer repair technician for help
questions.answer: C) Run a virus scan on your computer
